title: GHl Funnel Expert
job_overview:
We're looking for a GoHighLevel pro who knows how to build full funnel systems – not just landing pages. Ideally, you've already worked in the coaching/consulting space and know how to structure multi-step, high-ticket funnels that convert.

To apply, please send us:
– Confirmation of a stable internet connection
– 2–3 examples of funnels you've built in GHL
– A short explanation of one change you made that turned a funnel into a game changer

Bonus if you’ve worked on:
? Multi-step funnels
? High-ticket offers
? Coaching or consulting lead gen

Let's talk if you know your way around advanced automations, follow-ups & pipeline logic.
